Hello
I have a question surrounding how we will handle Authorized Reps - I'm not sure where to post this question.

What are clients(?) doing to help the back-end understand the intent of the person logging in, I can think of 3 scenarios:
1) I'm not a member, and I represent 1 member
2) I'm not a member, and I represent multiple members
3) I'm a member myself, but I also represent 1 or more other members

I apologize if I'm asking about a well understood solution, if this is the case I'd appreciate pointing me to the right resources.
